entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Bow Valley (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
